package.name: perception-traffic-light-detection
package.description: The perception module incorporates the capability of using multiple cameras, radars (front and rear) and LiDARs to recognize obstacles and fuse their individual tracks to obtain a final track list. The obstacle sub-module detects, classifies and tracks obstacles. This sub-module also predicts obstacle motion and position information (e.g., heading and velocity). For lane line, we construct lane instances by postprocessing lane parsing pixels and calculate the lane relative location to the ego-vehicle (L0, L1, R0, R1, etc.).
